alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 5:58PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lower Keys in Monroe County through 630 PM EDT... At 558 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Big Coppitt Key to Cudjoe Key. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Key West, Boca Chica, Big Coppitt Key, Boca Chica Channel Bridge, Saddlebunch Keys, Geiger Key, Sunset Key, Shark Key, Upper Sugarloaf Key and Fleming Key. This includes US 1 between mile markers 0 and 19. This includes US 1 between mile markers 0 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
